entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
